subject: Re: Order #SSN3717 confirmed
description_text:
Dear Simsonn!

Today I received my order, but it is incomplete again. I ordered my pedals with baseplate, and heal plate, but both missing.
This is really frustrating for me, 2nd order completed with missing parts.

Pelease send it for me soos as possible, because I can not use egy pedal set without the plates.

Thank you in advance!

Gabor Bernhardt

conversations.body_text: Hi Bernhardt Gábor,    We apologize, but the base plate is currently out of stock at our German warehouse. We have shipped it to you separately. Here is your tracking link:   https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSELI0279354123YQ
